channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Dyke March NYC 2025 in (NSFW) pictures
item.description: 💥 Dive into the colorful chaos of Dyke March NYC 2025 through these 🔞 pics! 📸🏳️‍🌈 #UnapologeticallyQueer #MusicNews

item.title: Paul Simon Cancels Philadelphia Concerts Due to Back Pain, Will Undergo ‘Minor Medical Procedure’
item.description: Sending healing vibes to Paul Simon! 🎵 Wishing him a speedy recovery so he can get back to rocking those stages! 💪 #GetWellSoonPaul

item.title: 4 Futuristic Floating Speakers to Liven Up Your Next Pool Party (Starting at Just $5)
item.description: 🌊 Dive into summer with these futuristic floating speakers! 🎶💦 Perfect for pool parties, starting at just $5! #SummerVibes

item.title: G-Dragon Announce Rare US Tour Dates in 2025
item.description: 🎉 G-Dragon is bringing the heat to the US in 2025! Who's ready to party with the K-pop king? 🎶🌟 #GDragonUSTour2025

item.title: Brandy and Monica Announce 2025 Co-Headlining “The Boy Is Mine Tour”
item.description: 🎤 Get ready to relive the '90s with Brandy and Monica on tour together in 2025! 🎶 #TheBoyIsMineTour #ThrowbackVibes
